## Cylinder.OpenEnded property

Gets or sets a value indicating whether this [`Cylinder`](../../cylinder) open ended. The default value is false.

```csharp
public bool OpenEnded { get; set; }
```

## Property Value

`true` if open ended; otherwise, top/bottom caps exists.
